sections.title: What are Cookies
sections.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience and improve our services.

sections.title: Types of Cookies We Use
sections.content: We use essential cookies for website functionality, analytics cookies to understand usage patterns, and preference cookies to remember your settings.

sections.title: Essential Cookies
sections.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled. They include session management and security features.

sections.title: Analytics Cookies
sections.content: We use analytics cookies to understand how visitors interact with our website, helping us improve user experience and service quality.

sections.title: Managing Cookies
sections.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.

sections.title: Third-Party Cookies
sections.content: Our website may contain links to third-party services that set their own cookies. We are not responsible for their cookie practices.

metadata.title: Cookie Policy - El7a2ny
metadata.description: Learn about how El7a2ny uses cookies to improve your browsing experience and provide better services.
